books.title: Misalliance
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: On a pleasant summer afternoon, a sudden plane crash followed by a would-be assassin interrupt a family’s conversations about marriage.

books.title: The Nibelungenlied
books.author: Anonymous
books.summary: The epic poem that follows the legendary hero Siegfried on his adventures, his death, and his wife’s revenge.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: Children’s Stories
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A collection of Oscar Wilde’s children’s stories.

books.title: An Ideal Husband
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: Over the course of twenty-four hours, a blackmail plot threatens to bring down a member of the British aristocracy.

books.title: The Unicorn from the Stars
books.author: Lady Gregory
books.summary: A young man’s visions disrupt the peace of his community.

books.title: The House of Arden
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Two children, with the aid of a magical white mole, travel into the past in search of their family’s long-lost treasure.

books.title: Manhattan Transfer
books.author: John Dos Passos
books.summary: Several characters strive for happiness and excitement in early twentieth century New York City.

books.title: Brood of the Witch-Queen
books.author: Sax Rohmer
books.summary: A father and son duo investigate a man who is wielding ancient Egyptian magic.

books.title: The Life of Buffalo Bill
books.author: William F. Cody
books.summary: The 1879 autobiography of William F. Cody, more commonly known as Buffalo Bill, detailing his early life in the American West.

books.title: Clouds of Witness
books.author: Dorothy L. Sayers
books.summary: An aristocrat with a passion for detective work has to clear the Duke, his brother, from a charge of murder.

books.title: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin
books.author: Benjamin Franklin
books.summary: Benjamin Franklin writes about his youth, adventures, and achievements.

books.title: Principia Ethica
books.author: G. E. Moore
books.summary: An analysis of the concept of good that diagnoses the history of ethics as being marred by the “naturalistic fallacy” while discussing intrinsic goods and evils.

books.title: Festus
books.author: Philip James Bailey
books.summary: A man goes on a quest for knowledge, truth, and understanding in the face of the complexities of existence and spirituality.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Manly Wade Wellman
books.summary: A collection of horror and science fiction stories by Manly Wade Wellman.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Beatrix Potter
books.summary: A collection of Beatrix Potter’s short stories for children, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Imitation of Christ
books.author: Thomas à Kempis
books.summary: Thomas à Kempis provides instructions for a Christian spiritual life.

books.title: On a Chinese Screen
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A collection of short vignettes about the people and places W. Somerset Maugham encountered during his travels along the Yangtze River in 1919–20.
